snippet: Members of Ansar Dine, a group that supports a puritanical version of Islam, used pickaxes to demolish three more Sufi mausoleums in Timbuktu.
abstract: Islamist militants in Mali continue to destroy shrines of Sufi saints, despite international calls to halt their attacks; hard-line Salafi group Ansar Dine considers the centuries-old shrines in Timbuktu to be idolatrous, and plans to destroy all 16 of the city's main shrines.
lead_paragraph: Members of Ansar Dine, a group that supports a puritanical version of Islam, used pickaxes to demolish three more Sufi mausoleums in Timbuktu.

headline.seo: Militants in Mali Continue to Destroy Shrines of Sufi Saints
headline.main: Islamist Militants in Mali Continue to Destroy Shrines
headline.print_headline: Islamist Militants in Mali Continue to Destroy Shrines
